KnnClassifier Class Reference

Classifier of the OCR process based on the KNN paradigm. More...

std::auto_ptr
< ClassificationAlgorithm > 		classificationAlgorithm_
 Concrete classification algorithm to be used.

Detailed Description

This class implements the OCR classification stage using the KNN paradigm to match every feature vector to its associated character.

See also:
Classifier, FeatureVector

const std::vector< std::string > & Classifier::characters (  )  const [inline, virtual, inherited]

Returns:
An array of std::string objects with the characters found, one character per feature vector passed in Classifier::classify() method.

const std::vector< std::string > & KnnClassifier::performClassification ( const std::vector< FeatureVector > &  featureVectors  )  [virtual]

Parameters:
featureVectors An array of feature vectors to classify.
Returns:
An array of std::string objects with the characters found, one character per vector element.
Postcondition:
The recognized characters become also available through the Classifier::characters() method.
